name: Densha de Go! 2 3000
description:
Densha de Go! is a Japanese series of arcade train driving games. The goal for the players is to stop the train at the stations in exactly the right position while keeping up with the schedule, obeying all traffic rules, and ensuring the safety and comfort of their passengers.

In order to celebrate 3000 active Densha de Go! 2 arcade units, Taito released an extended "3000 units" edition to the arcades, which was later ported to other systems.

In addition to the routes of Densha de Go! 2, this edition includes the following routes:
  • Akita Shinkansen from ?magari to Morioka
  • Akita Shinkansen from Akita to Shin-Hanamaki
  • ?u Main Line from Akita to Omagari
  • Tazawako Line from Tazawako to Morioka
  • Keihin-T?hoku Line from Yokohama to Shinagawa
  • Keihin-T?hoku Line from Yokohama to Ueno
  • T?kaid? Main Line from Osaka to Kobe
  • Yamanote Line (Outer Circle) from Tokyo to Shinjuku
